<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rampart Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1283)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 30</row>

**Price** 1,900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Tower Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=4)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This massive [tower shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=4) (Hardness 10, HP 60, BT 30) is painted a cool cyan green and is decorated with an image of Absalom's mother-sphinx emerging from a cresting wave.

<document level="2" id="action-1016" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
